title: Feature: The Music From Skins (S6, E4)
body:
So with the introduction of a new character last week, Skins served up possibly the most interesting episode so far, focusing on Franky and her constant yearning to be ‘relevant’, whilst having lots of sex but not being seen as a whore.

It’s what we all want bb.

Franky dances in her bedroom – **Owl Vision** – _Antichrist_

Franky stresses over exams – **Zola Jesus** – _Night_

Franky finds Luke – **Rustie** – _Hyperthrust_

Mini ‘on the phone’ – **Moon Duo** – _Killing Time_

In Luke’s car – **MMM** – _Dex_

First sex scene – **Segal** – _Alex Handcock’s MMA Disaster_ (Not available)

Franky leans out the window – **Teen Daze** – _Malacandra_

Franky and Sweetcheeks argue – **Phoenix Unique** – _Just Don’t Give a Fuck_

Luke drops Franky home – **Widowspeak** – _Limbs_

Franky runs to the park – **How To Dress Well** – _Suicide Dream 2_

Nick and Franky in the park – **Thurston Moore** – _Blood Never Lies_

Franky in therapy – **Florence and the Machine** – _Shake It Out (The Weeknd Remix)_

Franky goes to see Luke – **Kuedo** – _Salt Lake Cuts_

Nick saves Franky from the fight – **Marianne Faithfull** – _Broken English_

Nick gets punched by Luke – **Segal** – _Lincolnshire_ (Not Available)

Sex scene – **Twin Sister** – _The Other Side of Your Face_

Franky leaves Luke’s flat – **Teen Daze** – _Watch Over Me_

Nick and Franky make up – **Anna Calvi** – _Desire_

It’s what we all want bb. Franky dances in her bedroom – Owl \[…\]
